data.name: Survarium
data.detailed_description:
Just Updated

Check out the latest 0.29 version of Survarium beta and join our time-limited Solstice Days event now!

http://steamcommunity.com/games/survarium/announcements/detail/216519084233032640


New DLC Available

http://store.steampowered.com//app/369490
http://store.steampowered.com//app/359522


About the Game

Survarium is a post-apocalyptic online FPS game. If you are looking for a shooter where skills matter, look no further! The opposing players, deadly anomalies and traps will never stop you on the way to victory, right? Then start playing now for free!

Join the Survarium Open Beta to experience intense team-based PvP action!

Key Features:

  • INTENSE TEAM BATTLES 8X8 (PVP)
    Enjoy 3 PvP play modes: Team Deathmatch, Research and unique Battery Retrieval (Protective Device)!

  • REALISTIC COMBAT EXPERIENCE
    Make use of the huge selection of realistic modifiable weapons each with a variety of ammo types available. Use extras, such as traps, artifacts and more to dominate in the game.

  • DEVELOP YOUR CHARACTER THE WAY YOU WANT
    Experience total freedom of action in the way you build up your character - two different directions with multiple perks available!

  • ATMOSPHERE OF POST-APOCALYPSE
    Experience the unique atmosphere of abandoned cities, decaying industrial sites, derelict military bases and other real-world locations.

  • INFLUENCE THE STORY DEVELOPMENT
    Play actively to impact the way the story develops in the game. Players decide which way the story goes next!

  • CUTTING-EDGE GRAPHICS
    The Vostok Engine behind the game sports some of the best graphics in the genre. Immerse yourself within the world of Survarium!

data.reviews:
“We’ve all fallen hopelessly in love with ruined wastelands before, but this really is exceptional.”
RockPaperShotgun

“The short, sharp combat is a thrill to experience, the atmosphere is thick with violence and the world looks beautiful. This isn’t just combat – it’s about hunting down humans and surviving in a brutalist landscape.”
VG24/7

“It's twitchy, but as shooters go it has a tactical, methodical pace. As it evolves, the team plans to expand on that formula to include cooperative, and perhaps even single player modes.”
Polygon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista (Service Pack 2 + Platform update), Windows 7, Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4400 2.0 GHz or Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 4200+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB nVidia GeForce 8800 GT or Radeon HD 3870
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Hard Drive: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game does not support Windows XP! Also, we do not guarantee stable game experience on Windows 10, because this OS is not yet officially out and Survarium has not been tested on it.
